privacy.title: Afra7na Platform Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Afra7na, we consider your privacy very important. This policy defines how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information. By using our platform, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

sections.title: Information We Collect
items: Account information (name, email, phone number, optional profile picture)
Usage data (types of services used, browsing duration, preferences)
Payment information (via secure gateways like PayFort or Apple Pay; we do not store card data)
Technical data (IP address, browser type, language settings)

sections.title: How We Use Data
items: Improve and personalize user experience
Provide better technical support and troubleshoot issues
Send important updates or special offers (with your consent)
Analyze platform performance and make improvements
Comply with legal obligations

sections.title: Information Protection
items: Encrypt data during transmission using TLS/SSL protocols
Secure storage according to PCI DSS standards for payment data
Restricted access for authorized personnel only
Regular security audits of the system

sections.title: Your Rights
items: Request a copy of your personal data
Request correction of inaccurate information
Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal restrictions)
Unsubscribe from promotional messages
Withdraw consent for data processing

sections.title: Data Sharing with Third Parties
items: Only approved payment service providers
Service partners necessary for platform operation
Government entities when legally required
We do not sell your data to external marketing parties

terms.title: Afrahna Platform Terms of Use
terms.intro: These terms govern your use of the Afrahna platform and define users' rights and obligations. Please read them carefully before using the platform.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
items: By using Afrahna, you agree to be bound by these terms.
If you do not agree to any part, you must stop using the platform.

sections.title: Platform Usage
items: Use the platform only for legal and legitimate personal or professional purposes.
Do not post or share offensive, misleading, illegal, or rights-violating content.
Fraudulent or harmful activities are prohibited.

sections.title: Account Creation
items: Provide accurate and complete information when creating an account.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials.
Report any unauthorized use of your account immediately.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
items: All intellectual property rights belong to Afrahna or its licensors.
Do not copy, republish, or reuse any part of the platform without written permission.

sections.title: Modifications to Terms
items: We may update these terms at any time at our discretion.
Updates will be posted on this page with the modification date.
Continued use of the platform after changes means acceptance of the updated terms.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How can I book a service from the platform?
faq.a1: Browse the categories, choose the right service, then click 'Book Now' and follow the instructions to complete the booking
faq.q2: Do I need to create an account to book?
faq.a2: Yes, you must be registered so we can link bookings to you and offer proper support
faq.q3: Can I cancel a booking after payment?
faq.a3: Yes, but depending on the providerâ€™s policy. Some services allow full or partial refunds within a specific period
faq.a4: We accept credit cards, Apple Pay, STC Pay, and bank transfer for certain plans
faq.q5: How can I contact the service provider?
faq.a5: After booking, a 'Contact Provider' button will appear on your booking page. You can also contact us directly
